text: John Lodge may refer to: * John Lodge (musician) (born 1945), bass guitarist for the Moody Blues * John Lodge (archivist) (died 1774), English historian who wrote The Peerage of Ireland * John C. Lodge (1862–1950), Mayor of Detroit * John Davis Lodge (1903–1985), American film actor, politician, and diplomat * John Lodge (librarian) (1792–1850), librarian of the University of Cambridge == See also == * St. John's Lodge (disambiguation) * John C. Lodge Freeway, route M-10 in southeast Michigan * Governor John Davis Lodge Turnpike, usually known as the (former) Connecticut Turnpike
title: John Lodge
